yo.title: Full-Stack Developer who has worked as a Web and Graphic Designer on several projects being a freelance or part of a multidisciplinary team.
yo.text: Knowledge and supervision of the usability, accessibility, aesthetic, interactivity and communication in the design process. A musician who loves music and has been making noise with a guitar for over 25 years.

footer.text: Hummingbirds are birds native to the Americas and constitute the biological family Trochilidae which are among the smallest of birds. They are known as hummingbirds because of the humming sound created by their beating wings which flap at high frequencies audible to humans.
